text:
take a chair 搬椅子 Sit down 坐下; take the chair 开始开会  
ab. realize, accept  
realize 认识到某一东西, 但不一定接受; accept 接受  
7 remind a girl, but I didn't accept it.  
a1. wear, put on, dress  
wear 和 dress 表示状态, wear 指光服装, 可用来修饰时; dress 指衣服, be dressed in, put on 表示动作。It's cold outside; Put on your warm clothes.  
ab. listen, hear  
listen 强调动作; hear 强调结果。I listened, but I heard nothing.  
a1. throw to, throw at  
throw to 扔到……; throw at 扔……。He threw a stone at me.  
ab. in charge of, in the charge of  
in charge of 管理, 负责照料; in the charge of 由……照料。  
He is in charge of the matter. The matter is in the charge of her.  
ab. in class, in the class  
in class 在课上; in the class 在班级里。  
He is the best student in the class.  
ab. on fire, on the fire  
on fire 着火; on the fire 在火上。  
Put the food on the fire. The house is on fire.  
ab. out of question, out of the question  
out of question 毫无疑问的; out of the question 不可能的。  
ab. a second, the second  
a second 秒, 再……; the second 第二……。He won the second prize.  
ab. by day, by the day  
by day 白天; by the day 每天计算。The workers are paid by the day.
